import React from 'react'; import { Link } from 'react-router-dom'; import './header.css'; import logo from '../../images/logo-empty.png'; export default function Header({ pageName, setPageName }) { return (
  • setPageName("Selected Work")} className={pageName === "Selected Work" ? "active" : ""}> Selected Work
  • setPageName("About")} className={pageName === "About" ? "active" : ""}> About
